name: Revelation Online
content:
game:
  appid: 876330
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: '1'
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: '1'
    WINEESYNC: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_SKIP_CLEANUP: '1'
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: '1'
    __PBA_CB_HEAP: '128'
    __PBA_GEO_HEAP: '512'
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
winesteam:
  version: esync-staging-pba-3.18-x86_64
